item.description:
Are you a creative mogul or do you not feel creative one bit?? This group has something for everyone who loves to craft with paper. Learn some tips and tricks from the Stampin' Up! professionals, while hanging out with new friends Scrapbooking, cardmaking, hand made gifts, hotplates, coasters, chipboard frames and more!! The possibilities are endless...

Meet other local individuals who enjoy rubber stamping and scrapbooking. Share ideas and bring projects to work on. We want to swap ideas, socialize and share our passion for our craft with others! The Organizer is Selene Kempton, I have been a Stampin' UP! Demonstrator for over 3 years. Some projects are strictly Stampin' Up! others can be anything goes!

You can order from my website 24/7! You can also see my calendar and attend other events other than those advertised on this meetups group. http://www.selenek.stampinup.net

ALSO...I have a project blog! http://www.stampinfunwithselene.blogspot.com/
item.name: The Merrimac Valley Paper Crafters Social Meetup Group
